questions.question: Which ICAO document concerns international Commercial Air Transport (CAT) for fixed wing aeroplanes?
Does a take-off alternate always need to be nominated?
options: No, only if the weather at destination is below limits for landing.
No, only if the weather at the departure airport is below limits for landing.
questions.solution: No, only if the weather at the departure airport is below limits for landing.

questions.question: For purposes of recording, when does flight time start?
options: Taxi with the intention of take-off
questions.solution: Taxi with the intention of take-off

questions.question: What colour, and through what angle can the port wing-tip navigation light be seen?
Are SARPs legally binding?
options: Yes if a country is a signatory to the ICAO conventions
No but signatory states must agree to incorporate them into national regulations
No, only in EASA member states
questions.solution: No but signatory states must agree to incorporate them into national regulations
